duties_responsibilities.duty: Execute and coordinate community driving and monetized events in-store on a weekly basis.
Assist with in-store events such as Birthday Parties and Pairings, preparing and conducting events at the Community Table.
Support vendor sponsored sampling at the sampling stand and assist with large catering sales.
Work with CMM on local social posts to support marketing initiatives and outside selling, with an emphasis on seasonal goals.
Provide support to Cart 2 Class and assist in events in the community, including activations at sponsorships and store-based outreach.
